name: Community Beacon- Everett Middle School
description: The Mission Community Beacon at Everett Middle School provides after-school and summer programming, school-day support, and parent engagement through a collaboration of program partners. The Beacon serves as a community center hub providing academic, social, and emotional support to Mission youth and families as they prepare for lives as successful adults.
